rows.label: qev035402_MSG0001
rows.name:
Hey there, champ! That was some pretty impressive
fighting you did there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0002
rows.name: Taking out an ugly that big must fetch a fat bounty.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0003
rows.name:
You've gotta be tired. Why not let your fellow BLADEs
collect the cash for you while you catch some shut-eye?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_SEL0021
rows.name: Keep a cool head and try to reason with Gus.

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0004
rows.name:
Haw haw! Listen to this one spout off like someone
gives a rat's ass.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0005
rows.name:
Huh? I don't know what the hell you're trying to say,
but if it ain't "Yes, sir," then I ain't interested.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0006
rows.name:
I guess you don't know what happens to people who
cop that kind of attitude with us. But no worries.
Ol' Gus will teach you soon enough.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev035402_MSG0007
rows.name:
[ST:gender p1=He's p2=She's ] all yours, fellas! Time to teach Quincy's little
errand [ST:gender p1=boy p2=girl ] here how we do things downtown![ST:wait ]
